text: Li Zhaoxing (; born 20 October 1940) is a Chinese politician. He was the Foreign Minister of the People's Republic of China from 2003 to 2007. Li was born in Jiaonan, Qingdao, Shandong. He was a member of the Communist Party of China. He was appointed as one of the Elders but chose not to continue with the role. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:20th-century Chinese politicians Category:People from Shandong
title: Li Zhaoxing
